content: @Sergey Togi Dashnyam was asking on private for tasks
it may be a good idea to discuss this here
right now I can think of three possibilities

1. we have a project on rustc-guide repo where we have the main tasks we want to accomplish. Basically we had a lot of compiler experts giving some lectures and all that information is not yet on guides. The idea is to watch those, understand them, ask questions and get a lot of information back to write a chapter about those. Take a look in this project there are a bunch, some are already taken. You can comment on a github issue with @rustbot claim to have the issue "assigned" to you

2. look at last meeting we had, we ended deciding to try to summarize together a lecture, you can join that. The idea is the same as in (1) but we will have a meeting to discuss things and collect questions and then ask those to @nikomatsakis on a different meeting.
3. go to the issue tracker and help triaging issues and prs and/or fixing them :)

1. we have a project on rustc-guide repo where we have the main tasks we want to accomplish. Basically we had a lot of compiler experts giving some lectures and all that information is not yet on guides. The idea is to watch those, understand them, ask questions and get a lot of information back to write a chapter about those. Take a look in this project there are a bunch, some are already taken. You can comment on a github issue with @rustbot claim to have the issue "assigned" to you

Ty, I'll pick an issue from the Kanban backlog :)

I self assigned this one: https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-guide/issues/358
I can't move it to "In progress", I guess only Santiago can do it..
yeah, need admin rights for that I think, would be nice to be able to allow that though
@Sergey Togi Dashnyam you should now be able to do that
we were chatting in private with @Sergey Togi Dashnyam and we were saying that we could have a contributing to rustc-guide chapter inside the guide, something that helps people to get started
@Sergey Togi Dashnyam is going to try to write some things down
